document.discussion_title: "Grasim-AB Nuvo merger not to fund Idea," says Birla
document.topic_text: Kumar Mangalam Birla , chairman of $41 billion Group on Thursday announced the merger of Aditya Birla Nuvo Ltd ( ABNL ) with Grasim Industries Ltd to restructure the complex operations and to create a $9 billion (Rs 59,766 crore) enterprise
document.post: Kumar Mangalam Birla , chairman of $41 billion Group on Thursday announced the merger of Aditya Birla Nuvo Ltd ( ABNL ) with Grasim Industries Ltd to restructure the complex operations and to create a $9 billion (Rs 59,766 crore) enterprise
